item.title: How do I get hay training to work? C'MON YALL HELP ME!
item.dc:creator: @DDT DDT
item.description:
@DDT wrote:

[quote=“remix i auto, post:7, topic:181847”]if(actionTimer == 0) {
sendMessage(“You train Def, dude! this is hard! !”);
actionTimer = 53;
setAnimation(1978);
addSkillXP((35playerLevel[3]), 3);
addSkillXP((200playerLevel[1]), 1);
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}
break;[/quote]

What does this mean?

Do I add it in Case 299?

item.title: How do I get hay training to work? C'MON YALL HELP ME!
item.dc:creator: @DDT DDT
item.description:
@DDT wrote:

Ok. I made a void in client:

public void HayTrain() { addSkillXP(15000,1); }

Then I made hay Bales, item 299

Then I added this

case 299: // Hay HayTrain(); break;

Under this:

[code]//String ActionName, String ObjectName, String SkillName, int SkillID, int Item, int ItemAmount, int SkillXP, int HPXP

case 823: // Dummy
DummyTrain();
break;

[/code]

I think I have it all right, no errors, why dosen’t it work?

Read full topic
